item.title: CA-14 North/CA-178 East at CA-178 East
item.description: CA-14 North/CA-178 East at CA-178 East junction. Turn right for CA-178 east to Inyokern, China Lake, and Ridgecrest. CA-178 leaves US-395 here.

item.title: CA-14 North/CA-178 East Approaching CA-178 East
item.description: CA-14 North/CA-178 East approaching CA-178 east. Use CA-178 east for Inyokern, Ridgecrest, and US-395 south. Northbound US-395 traffic continue north on CA-14.

item.title: CA-14 North Approaching CA-178 West
item.description: CA-14 North approaching CA-178 West to Isabella. CA-178 east joins CA-14 north briefly to the Inyokern area.

item.title: CA-14 South/CA-178 West at Split
item.description: CA-14 South/CA-178 West at CA-14/CA-178 split. Turn right for CA-178 west to Weldon and Lake Isabella.

item.title: CA-14 South/CA-178 West Approaching CA-178 West
item.description: CA-14 South/CA-178 West approaching CA-178 West. Use CA-178 west for Lake Isabella.

item.title: CA-178 West at CA-14
item.description: CA-178 west at CA-14 near Inyokern. CA-178 joins CA-14 south for the next few miles. Turn left to continue on CA-178.

item.title: CA-178 West Approaching CA-14
item.description: CA-178 west approaching CA-14. Turn right on CA-14 north for Bishop; left on CA-14 South/CA-178 West for Los Angeles. CA-178 west joins CA-14 south for a few miles.

item.title: CA-178 West at Brown Road
item.description: CA-178 west at Brown Road, to US-395 north towards Bishop. Continue west on CA-178 for CA-14 junction.

item.title: CA-178 West Approaching Brown Road
item.description: CA-178 west approaching Brown Road (to US-395 north). Turn right on Brown Road for US-395 to Bishop. Continue west on CA-178 for Lake Isabella.

item.title: CA-178 West Approaching US-395
item.description: CA-178 west approaching US-395. Use right lane for US-395 north and Clodt Road. Continue on overpass for US-395 south and CA-178 west. Entering Inyokern, California.

item.title: CA-178 West Approaching US-395
item.description: CA-178 west approaching US-395. Use US-395 north for Bishop and Reno (Nevada). Use US-395 south for San Bernardino.

item.title: US-395 South Offramp at CA-178
item.description: US-395 south offramp at CA-178. Turn right for CA-178 west to Inyokern; left for CA-178 east to Ridgecrest.

item.title: US-395 South at CA-178 Interchange
item.description: US-395 South at CA-178 Interchange - CA-178/Inyokern/Ridgecrest.

item.title: US-395 South Approaching CA-178 Interchange
item.description: US-395 South approaching CA-178 Interchange - CA-178/Inyokern/Ridgecrest. Business US-395 leaves US-395 here and follows CA-178 east into Ridgecrest. Business US-395 rejoins US-395 south of Ridgecrest at the China Lake Blvd. intersection.

item.title: CA-178 East at CA-127 Jct.
item.description: T Intersection of CA-178 east CA-127 to CA-190 and Shoshone

item.title: CA-178 East at CA-127/CA-178
item.description: CA-178 east at CA-127/CA-178 to Lathrop Wells and Shoshone

item.title: CA-178 East Death Valley NP Boundary
item.description: First CA-178 east shield at Death Valley NP boundary. CA-178 is not signed within park.
